decisions.label: Check for Status

rules.name: Is_Status_New
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 5 AND (2 OR 8)) OR (((3 AND 6) OR (4 AND 7)) AND 2)
rules.label: Is Status New

rules.name: Is_Status_PAM_Approved
rules.conditionLogic: 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND ((1 AND 2 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9) OR (10 AND 11 AND 12))
rules.label: Is Status PAM Approved

GTMS-24952: Add Task creation element for each email alert on 10/16/24 GTMS-28208: Added condition to send emails to PAM when Deal registration status is updated to New GTMS-26100 : Added partner deactivatied check GTMS-28672: Added logic to send emails to new AEs when Owner changed to Deal registrations which are under AE Approval.

textTemplates.name: PR_AE_Approval_Email_Body

textTemplates.description: GTMS-24952: Created as part of Partner Alignment hyper care to create a task for PR AE saying the PR PAM Approval email is sent you.
textTemplates.name: PR_PAM_Approval_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},
You have a partner lead that requires your review!
CLICK HERE to access the deal registration and complete your review! Please choose to accept or deny this lead upon review, and, if accepted, the program type desired. Click here to review the step-by-step guide in Showpad. Please choose to accept or deny this lead upon review, and, if accepted, the program type desired. Partnerships Master List to see if there is a unique program guide associated with this partner.
